clients.title: Client Management

categories.title: Client Categories
categories.possibleActiveDescription: Purchased again within a month of their first purchase
categories.possibleInactiveDescription: Did not purchase again within a month of their first purchase
categories.inactiveDescription: No purchases for more than 2 months
categories.recoveredDescription: Was inactive for more than 2 months and purchased again
categories.lostDescription: Customers who have not made a purchase in more than 4 months.
categories.trackingDescription: Customers with a single purchase, between 1 and 4 weeks old.
categories.premiumDescription: Customers with the highest purchase volume.
categories.spendingCalculationNote: Calculation based on purchases in the last month.

empty.title: No clients
empty.description: You don't have registered clients with orders yet

pageTitles.title: Repartito - Admin Panel
pageTitles.description: Access Repartito's administrative tools to manage your business efficiently.

descriptions.users:view: Allows viewing the list of other system users.
descriptions.users:create: Allows creating new users (sellers or administrators).
descriptions.users:edit: Allows editing the information and permissions of other users.
descriptions.users:delete: Allows deleting users from the system.
descriptions.account:view_own: Basic permission to view one's own account information.
descriptions.account:edit_own: Allows the user to edit their own name and email.
descriptions.account:change_password: Allows the user to change their own password.
descriptions.account:manage_users: High-level permission to create, edit, and delete other users.
descriptions.clients:view: Allows viewing the list of assigned clients.
descriptions.clients:create: Allows registering new clients in the system.
descriptions.clients:edit: Allows modifying the information of existing clients.
descriptions.clients:delete: Allows deleting clients from the system.
descriptions.clients:view_account_balance: Allows viewing the account balance (debt/credit) of clients.
descriptions.clients:manage_account_balance: Allows adjusting the account balance of clients (e.g., registering a payment).
descriptions.inventory:view: Allows viewing the available product stock.
descriptions.inventory:manage: Allows updating the stock quantities of products.
descriptions.orders:create: Allows creating new orders for clients.
descriptions.products:view: Allows viewing the list of products and their prices.
descriptions.products:create: Allows adding new products to the catalog.
descriptions.products:delete: Allows deleting products from the catalog.
descriptions.sellers:view: Allows viewing information about other sellers.

meta.title: Repartito - Business Metrics for Client Retention
meta.description: Repartito gives you the necessary tools to analyze your business metrics, understand your clients' behavior and make strategic decisions to increase retention and sales.

hero.title: The platform that boosts your business
hero.paragraph: Repartito gives you the necessary tools to analyze your business metrics, understand your clients' behavior and make strategic decisions to increase retention and sales.

features.title: Why Choose Repartito

testimonials.title: What our clients say
testimonials.description: Discover how Repartito is helping businesses like yours to grow.

clients.name: Laura G.
clients.description: Since I started using Repartito, I understand my customers much better. I have been able to create personalized marketing campaigns that have increased my sales and customer loyalty.

clients.name: Carlos M.
clients.description: Repartito has given me the visibility I needed over my business. Now I can make strategic decisions based on real data, not intuition.

clients.name: Ana R.
clients.description: With Repartito's customer segmentation, I have been able to identify my most valuable customers and create loyalty programs that work. My retention rate has improved a lot!

clients.name: Pedro S.
clients.description: I was surprised how easy it is to use Repartito. In a few minutes I had my dashboards configured and I began to see super valuable information. I recommend it!

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.paragraph: Start using Repartito today and discover everything you can achieve.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have questions? We have answers. If you can't find what you are looking for, please contact us.

items.question: What is Repartito?
items.answer: Repartito is a platform that helps small and medium-sized businesses analyze their business data to make better decisions, with a focus on client retention.

items.question: How does it work?
items.answer: You connect your sales system (or upload your data) and Repartito automatically processes it to generate key metrics and reports.

items.question: What kind of businesses can use it?
items.answer: No, Repartito is a 100% online platform. You just need an internet connection to access your dashboards.

items.question: Is it secure?
items.answer: Yes, we take security very seriously. All your data is encrypted and protected with the highest security standards.

items.question: What is the price?
items.answer: We have different plans that adapt to the needs of your business. You can check them on our pricing page.

contact.title: Still have questions?
contact.description: Don't worry. Contact our team and we will be happy to help you.

newsletter.title: Get insights for your business
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive tips, case studies, and updates on how to leverage your data to grow.
